work.summary: The Bing Ads division at Microsoft is committed to helping advertisers and customers connect in today's competitive online marketplace. The paid search relevance and revenue team focuses on optimizing algorithms and the marketplace for a better Bing experience.
highlights: Drove multiple product features and deliverables emphasizing putting the user first.
Implemented new metrics for feature validation and debugging.
Exemplified excellent project management, organization, and commitment.

work.company: University of Colorado at Boulder: CU Language Project
work.summary: Pairing empirical research with computational models, the CU Language Project focuses on the intricate cognitive processeses that result in language acquisition.
highlights: Built semantic networks based on prototypical toddlers' language to study the interaction between phonology and semantics.
Led research study utilizing computational models to inform what words toddlers will learn next.
Expanded study by creating picture books based on models and measuring language acquisition of real toddlers.

work.summary: USAA is dedicated to providing the best financial services to the military community.
highlights: Contributed to a new business service for the property & casualty insurance team.

education.studyType: Bachelor of Arts Summa Cum Laude

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
